actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed letter of offer to sell six C-130 aircraft to Egypt (transmittal No. 76-47).

summary.text: Expresses the objection of Congress to the proposed sale to Egypt of six C-130 aircraft as described in the statement submitted by the President to the Speaker of the House and the chairman of the Committee on Foreign Relations of the Senate on March 25, 1976 (transmittal number 76-47).

titles.title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed letter of offer to sell six C-130 aircraft to Egypt (transmittal No. 76-47).
